[Home](./index.md) &gt; [composition-plot](./composition-plot.md) &gt; [BasePlot](./composition-plot.baseplot.md)

## BasePlot class

A class in charge of drawing a composition plot into an SVG element.

This class is fairly general, and relies on the following in order to customize the layout and appearance of the plot: - a color function - an opacity function - a vertices function - a sample position function - etc.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class BasePlot 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dataUpdated()](./composition-plot.baseplot.dataupdated.md) |  |  |
|  [drawData()](./composition-plot.baseplot.drawdata.md) |  | Draw the graphical elements associated to the samples and figures of merit |
|  [drawGrid()](./composition-plot.baseplot.drawgrid.md) |  | Draw the graphical elements associated to the plot grid |
|  [release()](./composition-plot.baseplot.release.md) |  | Remove all the graphical elements associated with this plot from the SVG element |
|  [render()](./composition-plot.baseplot.render.md) |  | Redraw all the graphical elements in the SVG |
|  [setBorderColorFn(fn)](./composition-plot.baseplot.setbordercolorfn.md) |  | Set the border color function |
|  [setBorderWidthFn(fn)](./composition-plot.baseplot.setborderwidthfn.md) |  | Set the border width function |
|  [setColorFn(fn)](./composition-plot.baseplot.setcolorfn.md) |  | Set the color function |
|  [setCompositionSpace(compositionSpace)](./composition-plot.baseplot.setcompositionspace.md) |  | Set the composition space of this plot<!-- -->The composition space is the list of elements that a sample can be expected to have in its composition |
|  [setEnableTooltip(enable)](./composition-plot.baseplot.setenabletooltip.md) |  | Enable/disable the tooltip that is displayed when hovering a sample |
|  [setLabelColorFn(fn)](./composition-plot.baseplot.setlabelcolorfn.md) |  | Set the label color function |
|  [setOpacityFn(fn)](./composition-plot.baseplot.setopacityfn.md) |  | Set the opacity function |
|  [setSampleRadius(radius)](./composition-plot.baseplot.setsampleradius.md) |  | Set the radius of a sample circle/hexagon/square |
|  [setSampleShape(shape)](./composition-plot.baseplot.setsampleshape.md) |  | Set the shape that will be used to draw samples |
|  [setSelectCallback(fn)](./composition-plot.baseplot.setselectcallback.md) |  | Set a callback function that will be invoked when a sample is clicked |
